originalText.text: One of the worst lawyers ever! The lawyers do not communicate the secretaries that answer the phones have attitude problems. Nothing is organized. They lie. Noone works together. I dont know whats worst the paralegals or the lawyers. If you think Michael The Bull is going to take you case thats not happening he dont even answer the phone. They been lieing for him for a year now about why he doesnt come to the phone. Just take the extra time to do a thorough search for an attorney because Michael Lamonsoff  IS NOT IT !

originalText.text: If you are looking for the best then Michael is it. His aggression for his clients are unmatched and his team are just as driven. I'm am so thankful for having him in my corner as he was able to get me a six figures settlement. Gloria was also a wonderful person as she take care of the finishing touches for me. Thank you to all who has helped me.

originalText.text: Well,  I am not new with Michael.  My previous case this law firm treated me very good and that's the reason I came back.  As expected they handled my case again very well. The staff is very nice with me. I would recommend the Law Office of Michael Lamonsoff to all anybody who is looking for a great lawyer. The bull don't play. The first  time I came to you guys it was my cousin Angie Martinez fromNew York Power 105.1 that referred me to the  law firm and since then I'm in love with the firm . Thank you Michael and all the staff for the good  treatment. Thats right if you have the bull, you don't have to worry about your case . Again millions thanks

originalText.text:
I coudnt recommend this law firm enough. My husband Jessie was involved in accident. They fought insurance company for the best results and delivered. Kept us informed trough the process, very professional , explained and answered every question we had. We put our trust in Michael and the team and felt very confident we were in good hands. Case was built strong for trial so the insurance company had no choice but settle for good amount of $$$. Huge THANK YOU to the whole TEAM, you just changed our life. Couldnt do it without you.
Will always recommend this firm to everyone we know. If you reading this review and was involved in accident dont hesitate call THE BULL!! you mess with bull you get the horns ðŸ™‚ Cheers !!!
